skill_e.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by 25/30/35/40/45% and illuminates the area. After 5 seconds the zone detonates dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.6) magic damage, slowing enemies hit for an additional ? second.

Activate again to detonate early.

skill_i.tooltip: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

skill_q.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for 2 seconds and dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.6) magic damage to each.

skill_r.tooltip:
Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing ? magic damage to all enemies in a line.

Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

skill_w.tooltip: Throws Lux's wand in target direction, shielding allied champions it touches from 50/75/100/125/150 (+0.3) damage for 2.5 seconds. Upon reaching its destination it returns, stacking the effect.
